title: Enhancing Online Learning Management Competencies: Mathematics Education Design and Operational Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Development of customized mathematics education operational competencies for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain at least three learning management strategies for effective course design in online learning environments.
Learners will be able to develop and apply at least two formative assessment tools for self-directed learners.
Learners will be able to propose operational plans to improve the efficiency of math content delivery by over 20% in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) environment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
